meanings.definition: To present or bring something into use or operation for the first time.
meanings.sent1: She introduces a new game to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The teacher introduces a fun activity to the class.
meanings.sent3: He introduces a talking robot to the quiet library.
meanings.sent4: The chef introduces a burst of flavor to the bland soup.
meanings.sent5: The magician introduces a rabbit out of an empty hat.

meanings.definition: To make someone known to someone else by name.
meanings.sent1: He introduces his friend to his parents.
meanings.sent2: The host introduces the guest to the audience.
meanings.sent3: She introduces her cat to the curious dog.
meanings.sent4: The author introduces the main character with a dramatic entrance.
meanings.sent5: The guide introduces the historical figure to the tourists.
